entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 26.

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
